TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader
Public NotInheritable Class OracleDataReader Inherits DbDataReader
public ref class OracleDataReader sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader

summary.span: 提供从数据源读取数据行的只进流的方法。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Close ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Close ()
public: override void Close();

summary.span: 关闭 对象。

span.span: Closes the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多个可以打开在任何给定时间。More than one can be open at any given time. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`连接时， `DataReader`，或在任何其他托管的对象`Finalize`你类的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a connection, a `DataReader`, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，你应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9).

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Depth As Integer
public: virtual property int Depth { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前行的嵌套深度。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the depth of nesting for the current row.
The depth of nesting for the current row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最外面的表的深度为零。The outermost table has a depth of zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int FieldCount { get; }
.property instance int32 FieldCount
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property FieldCount As Integer
public: virtual property int FieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前行中的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 如果不是位于有效的记录集中，则为 0；否则为当前记录的列数。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid record set, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括隐藏的字段。Includes hidden fields. 使用 可排除隐藏的字段。Use to exclude hidden fields. 之后执行的查询不返回行，返回 0。After executing a query that does not return rows, returns 0.

exception.span: 没有到数据源的当前连接。

span.span: There is no current connection to a data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public override long GetBytes (int i, long fieldOffset, byte[] buffer2, int bufferoffset, int length);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int64 GetBytes(int32 i, int64 fieldOffset, unsigned int8[] buffer2, int32 bufferoffset, int32 length) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetBytes (i As Integer, fieldOffset As Long, buffer2 As Byte(), bufferoffset As Integer, length As Integer) As Long
public: override long GetBytes(int i, long fieldOffset, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer2, int bufferoffset, int length);

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: fieldOffset
param.span: 字段中读取操作开始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the field where the read operation is to begin.

param.name: buffer2
param.span: 要读入字节流的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferoffset
param.span: buffer 开始写操作位置的索引。

span.span: The index where buffer is to begin the write operation.
The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 将字节流从指定列偏移量读入到缓冲区中，将其作为从给定缓冲区偏移量开始的数组。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 读取的实际字节数。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字段中的可用字节数。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 在大多数情况下这是字段的确切长度。In most cases this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的版本号可能会小于该字段的真实长度如果`GetBytes`具有用于从字段中获取字节。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 这可能是这种情况，例如，如果正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of . 如果传递的缓冲区，则 null 值，返回字段的长度以字节为单位。If you pass a buffer that is a null value, returns the length of the field in bytes.

The number of characters to read.

summary.span: 将字符流从指定列偏移量读入到缓冲区中，将其作为从给定缓冲区偏移量开始的数组。

span.span: Reads a stream of characters from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 读取的实际字符数。

span.span: The actual number of characters read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的字段中的可用的字符数。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 在大多数情况下这是字段的确切长度。In most cases this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的版本号可能会小于该字段的真实长度如果`GetChars`具有用于从字段中获取字符。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 这可能是这种情况，例如，如果正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of . 如果传递的缓冲区，则 null 值。If you pass a buffer that is a null value. 以字符为单位返回字段的长度。 returns the length of the field in characters.

summary.span: 返回一个可用于循环访问数据读取器中的行的 。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此方法可用于检索显式枚举器，在支持 foreach 的语言构造，但很易于使用循环构造直接以循环访问数据读取器中的行。Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit enumerator, in languages that support a foreach construct, it's simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，方法提供了高效地检索所有列，而不是分别都检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually. 你可以将传递数组，其中包含生成的行中包含的列数少于。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 数据量数组包含复制到数组。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 你还可以传递其长度是多个结果行中包含的列数的数组。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable ();

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它描述 OracleDataReader 的列元数据。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the OracleDataReader.

returns.span: 一个描述列元数据的 。

span.span: A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法按以下顺序返回关于每个列的元数据：The method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 列DataReader Column|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |列名ColumnName|列; 的名称这可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果无法确定列名称，则返回 null 值。If the column name cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此名称始终反映当前的视图或命令文本中的列的最新的命名。This name always reflects the most recent naming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|从零开始的列序号。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此列不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|列中值的最大可取长度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 对于使用固定长度的数据类型的列，这是数据类型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|如果是数值数据类型，这是列的最大精度。If is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 精度取决于列的定义。The precision depends on the definition of the column. `Float` 和`Double`Oracle 中的数据类型为二进制精度。`Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary precision.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|如果为数值数据类型，小数点右侧的数字个数。If is a numeric data type, the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. `Float` 和`Double`Oracle 中的数据类型是二进制的小数位数。`Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary scale.| |数据类型DataType|映射到的公共语言运行时类型。Maps to the common language runtime type of .| |IsLongIsLong|`true` 如果列包含二进制长对象 (BLOB)，包含很长的数据。`true` if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|`true` 如果使用者可以将列设置为 null 值;否则为`false`。`true` if the consumer can set the column to a null value; otherwise, `false`. 列可能包含 null 值，即使它不能设置为 null 值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |IsUniqueIsUnique|`true`： 在中返回表基表中任何两个行-可以在此列中具有相同的值。`true`: No two rows in the base table-the table returned in -can have the same value in this column. **是唯一的**可以保证`true`列独自构成一个键是否没有类型仅适用于此列的 UNIQUE 约束。**IsUnique** is guaranteed to be `true` if the column constitutes a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column. `false`： 此列可以包含基表中的重复值。`false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table. 此列的默认值为 false。The default for this column is false.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`： 此列是一组的行集中的列，合在一起，唯一标识该行。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 列集**IsKey**设置为 true 必须唯一地标识行集中的行。The set of columns with **IsKey** set to true must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 没有任何要求此列集是列的最小集。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 此列集可能会生成从基表的主键、 唯一约束或唯一索引。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index. `false`: 列不需要唯一标识行。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|表或视图中包含的列的数据存储区的名称。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果基表名称不能确定，null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|数据存储区中列的名称。The name of the column in the data store. 这可能是不同于在返回的列名称**ColumnName**列，如果使用了别名。This might be different than the column name returned in the **ColumnName** column if an alias was used. 如果无法确定基列名称，或者如果派生的但并不完全相同，则行集列，数据中的列存储一个 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|中包含的列的数据存储的架构的名称。The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基础架构名称，null 值。A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| 每个列在结果集中返回一行。A row is returned for every column in the results set. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保元数据列返回正确的信息，必须调用与`behavior`参数设置为`KeyInfo`。To ensure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the `behavior` parameter set to `KeyInfo`. 否则，一些架构表中的列可能返回默认情况下，null，或不正确的数据。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns. 此方法返回的值可能是从 Oracle 的数字数据类型转换为.NET 十进制类型的结果。The value returned by this method might be the result of the conversion from Oracle's Number data type to .NET Decimal type. 如果太大，无法存储在.NET 十进制值，此方法将引发即溢出异常。If the value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal, this method throws an that is an overflow exception.
